checkin.title: Do you want to check-in ?
checkin.description: You are about to check-in to the {{location}}.

checkinSuccess.title: Check-in Success !
checkinSuccess.description: You have check-in to the {{location}}. Have fun.

checkout.title: Do you want to check-out ?
checkout.description: You are about to check-out from the {{location}}.

checkoutSuccess.title: Check-out Success !
checkoutSuccess.description: You have check-out from the {{location}}. Thanks for joining.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: Could not check in/out from {{location}}. Please try again.
